summary: This module provides a semi‑supervised training pipeline for the InfoGraph graph representation model applied to the QM9 molecular dataset. It defines a custom dataset class that loads dense edge representations of molecules, sets up data loading utilities, and includes helper routines for batching and optional evaluation.
business_intent: To demonstrate how to train a graph‑based self‑supervised model on molecular data with limited labeled examples, enabling researchers and developers to apply InfoGraph for property prediction in chemistry and materials science.
